@@General 

Match Format||A match consists of the best of three games, unless otherwise arranged. 

Winning a Game||Awarded by the first player or pair to reach 21 points. 

30-Point Cap||If the score becomes 29-all, the player or pair scoring the 30th point wins the game. 

Serving First||The player or pair winning a game serves first in the next game. 

@@Scoring 

Scoring a Point||Awarded when a side scores a point by hitting the shuttlecock over the net. 

Interval at 11 Points||When the leading score reaches 11 points, players have a 60-second interval. 

Interval Between Games||A two-minute interval between the second and third games is allowed. 

@@Serving 

Service Courts||Players shall stand within diagonally opposite service courts. 

No Feinting||The server and receiver shall not feint before the service commences. 

Service Height||The shuttlecock shall be hit below the server's waist. 

@@Faults 

Out of Bounds||If the shuttlecock falls outside the boundaries of the court. 

Net Fault||If the shuttlecock passes through or under the net. 

Touching the Net||If a player touches the net or its supports with racket or body.
